ExtraDecomposers.about_characters: There are such following characters in this play as a few people and different unusual characters.  They live in very unusual world and often collide with different unusual events. There is such character as Woman-devil living on the bottom of Pacific ocean and creating many perfect wonders using her magical forces. Anything she creates with defined purpose.

Helen: Hi, Judy, Cassandra. Go ahead and take your seats, please.

Cassandra: Hi, Helen. Nice to meet you!

Judy: Hi, Helen.

Author's words: Judy and Cassandra are coming in the court and sitting in the lounge.

Judy: I am always glad to be your host, Helen, because we are true friends. But I see you are looking a bit sullen. What’s happened?

Helen: I think about the story Beatriz told us last time when we talked threesome: you, me and her. The story was shrill.

Judy: This little flying shorty again! Do you mind that there are many other grander things in the world?

Helen: Of course, but I am not indifferent to such attractive and good creature.

Cassandra: What kind of story it was?

Helen: Last time when Judy visited me and you was busy with your work Beatriz told us her lamentable story. It was about her provenance. Earlier she was a human. There was one tragical event in result of which her life was ceased prematurely. What we see now is her epitome into this body of a decomposer after her human life.

Cassandra: Yes, it is impressive. What was the reason of her death?

Helen: Her organism was very defective because her parents were alcoholics. She does not know concretely what illness she had.

Cassandra: It is a pity that she had tragic end, died in earlier age. How is Beatriz now at all? Does she abide her security measures? Does she not breach from your aquarium without your overseeing?

Helen: No, she was very resigned and obedient last time. Now she has left me and flew from me to the nature.

Cassandra: It is definitely.

Helen: I know. It is a lamentable case that she can not go to the holidays with us. I would wish her long and happy life in this epitome.

Cassandra: I would like you to tell me how you and Judy spend your free time without me. You and Judy are more free than me now. I know you may see each other almost every day now. In the same time I am not such free as you. I continue working as a photographer.

Helen: Often we play tennis and engage some sport exercises. Also we sit here and talk about something what is related to our friendship. It is approximately like we have time all three: me, you and Judy.

Judy: Yes, it does not different from time when we are all three in our meeting.

Helen: Christian will be here with us soon. He promised to be with us for some time and communicate with us.

Cassandra: Are you serious? It seemed his work was so ongoing!

Helen: I am serious, trust me. He works very obstinately and rigorously, but sometimes he needs pauses and rest from his working. Now he has some free time to be with us or speak with his relatives.

Cassandra: It is cool! When he’s going to arrive?

Helen: He will arrive soon in a little time.

Cassandra: Will we may inquire about his purposes which he is striving for?

Helen: I think, we will. I hope you can inquire about that and get answers to the questions.

Judy: I am interested in the story particularly.

Cassandra: I am, too.

Judy: Helen, do you know what statements to achieve his purposes and end were in his previous life?

Helen: I do not know that in particular. I talk with him not very often. He is always fraught with his work as I told you.

Cassandra: It is enough intriguingly for me. I believe he will cope with achieving the purposes he has determined in this life, but I am heavy waiting when he will do that!

Helen: I am concerned in successful outcome in his engagement, too. My opinion is that scientists merit to be successful and happy in their life.

Judy: As I remember we have not glided anything what relates to our holidays yet. May we switch the theme of our conversation?

Helen: Yes, of course, but when Christian arrives we be compelled to set aside the conversation on this theme. Christian intends to devote this time to us with such hopeless that this time will be suitable to be spent for inquiring all about what interests us in his job. He has not too much free time for abstraction from his job and we must devote this time to what he is being diverted for.

Judy: Of course. What shall we do else? But I want us to tell about our holidays while he is not with us. So there is an actual and pertinent question what time will he arrive.

Helen: He said he would arrive between 12 and 1.

Judy: It is expressly. Now let’s talk about our time in Miami. I am imagining it in bright paints! Besides we must plan where we will live in this time.

Helen: I saw the magazine where it is told about the places where incoming visitors may live. I know you saw the magazine. But we have not made our choice yet.

Judy: Bring the magazine here, please! I will choose the place on the bank of the sea with enjoying!

Author's words: Helen is going for the magazine

Judy: You know, Cassandra, now my paramount interesting thought is about our time in the holidays! It is even more intriguingly that Christian’s life albeit I am concerned about his success in the science.

Cassandra: I am interested in both these deals.

Judy: I hope the events and impressions from the holidays will divert Helen from incisive thoughts about Beatriz’s flying off.

Author's words: Helen is appearing with the magazine and sitting to the table with Judy and Cassandra. Judy is taking the magazine.

Judy: It is a wonderful magazine! I see there is a map with hotels besides the images with what is in the hotel rooms! Now let's choice a haven.

Author's words: After completed choice they listed a door call.

Helen: I will open the door. I presume this is Christian.

Cassandra: If this is him it is a very opportune moment!

Helen: Who is this?

Christian: This is me, Christian.

Author's words: Helen is opening the door.

Christian: Hi, girls.

Helen & Judy & Cassandra: Hi, Christian! Nice to meet you!

Christian: How are you?

Judy: We are going to go to the holidays in Miami. We will lay on the beach and swim in water. Also we will attend in a game museum where we will play one enthralling a bit dizzying game.

Christian: What kind of the game will it be?

Judy: It will be one game venue of which will be in water in enormous gigantic aquarium. We will be entitled play it there in special watertight suits with diving masks.

Christian: It is interesting.

Helen: Cassandra was concerned to you to go with us.

Christian: Sorry, I can not.

Helen: Can you tell us something about what you are devising now?

Christian: Of course, I can. It is not my secret.

Cassandra: What is your incentive to engage science so much?

Christian: In my previous life I did not finish anything what I was must finish. All the scientists are fond with their job very much. I am not an exception. There are no exceptions among the scientists. So I intend to do that in this life.

Cassandra: I know. I listened about that from Helen. What is it if to tell more concrete? Was there something unfathomable in your previous life to be a successful scientist?

Christian: I had so immense inclination as in this life. I conducted inquiries in such scientific area as decomposers. There was one unfavorable case in my job. At one moment I collided with one understandable fact. One day I meet a very strange looking creature in a forest.

Cassandra: Was this what really played out such negative role?

Christian: Yes, it was. I began my inquiry, but I had not could cope with my destination. It was too featured. It was something unimaginably striking. But I have not concluded that it is something superfluous and I purport to find out this secret in my current life. I know now epoch has changed. Such phenomena as extra-decomposers are norm in our epoch unlike the epoch when I lived my in previous life. So I am not thought as about a crazy man.

Cassandra: Can you tell us in particular what it was that you could not cope with in your previous life?

Christian: It is a story which will seem enough shrill for human perception, but I see you are enough interested. I collided with some special entities when I learnt extra-decomposers. I was a bit shocked but not deeply. The creature looked very surprising. It was just striking! It was like a daemon. It had bright-red eyes glowing in the dark, long clutches and hissed at me!

Cassandra: It must be you were daunted very much.

Christian: I scarcely did not go mad when I saw it. I turned and run away hastily from the forest. It played out very negative role in my life. I told different people about this accident. I could not hold it in my secret. The words about this scene breached textually from me. People decided that I was crazy. So I lost right to engage science after that. I was confined in a madhouse where I died prematurely from heavy yearning by such reason as science shortage.

Judy: Yes, Christian, you were right. The story is shrill really. It is unfair that some unknown creatures hinder to success in a scientist’s life and lead them to lamentable end.

Christian: So as you know my possibility to continue engaging in science area was reinstated when I had been born in this life and become 3 years old.

Helen: What creature was that?

Christian: In this time we know about such creatures almost nothing. Now they are thought as about real creatures which exist not only in imagination of a crazy person, they also exist outwards of a crazy person’s imagination in real world, but we know that they are somebody like daemons. Now I am working not in night time when it is not so scary.

Judy: It must be you long for to reach and find out it in this your life?

Christian: Of course, I do. I like pondering nature laws and make new discoveries and improve opened discoveries. Science engagement is an inalienable part of my life. I have epitomized in this my life exactly for this purpose. I just the same can not have this life without it. So I downright do not want be a usual child.

Judy: Is your work successfull now?

Christian: I evaluate my engagement as successful and meaningful work. Sometimes I am impelled to exert my mental forces and rack my brains in sciences, but I like it. It is so mysteriously and as if it is enchantingly. But I have not only good news. There are some hurdles to the success performing my mission. I do not like people who are hectic to believe in some unusual phenomena. For example, my granny who is enough incisive person in my life. Sometimes she impedes me to work with her hectic unrests.

Cassandra: What does she do what impedes you?

Christian: She behaves like a crazy superannuated idiot. She almost hectically philosophizes that I am a supernatural human and it is not normal. I am fed with her emotional trepidation and I do not know how to placate her mood. She scarcely is not going mad. Sometimes it summons resentment in me. It boils down that sometimes she hampers my working process and also I hinder calm in her life.

Helen: She does not look like a superannuated person. I think she is not 60 years old yet.

Christian: I am lucky my grandpa does not rage like her, but to be frankly it is amazing for me that he is calm though.

Cassandra: Is she hectic by the reason referred to the discrepancy between your age and character, attitude and capacity?

Christian: Of course, it is the reason for such mood. What else could it be?

Judy: Yes, Christian, you are a striking person! You are innovation as an extra-ordinary child, but I listened about some other children like you.

Christian: I understand you.

Judy: I listened about dissemination of such specific children as you, Christian. I read about them in papers. There are many children who have such innate aptitudes as you and are entitled to work as scientists in so early age. Did you hear about it?

Christian: Yes, I read in papers. These children have stories like mine. So now I am not the one such child in the world.

Cassandra: I found it is great!

Helen: How are your parents?

Christian: My mummy is in New York as I told you.

Helen: What about your dad? Is he OK? What is he ill?

Christian: He has gotten a venereal disease. I do not know exactly what disease is this.

Helen: Is he still in the hospital?

Christian: Yes, he is.

Helen: From whom has he been infected?

Christian: I do not know this. My dad is not very intelligent person. Rather he is an ignoramus who is interested in walking with different girls most of all. So he has walked my appearing in the world. I am glad I have gotten not very much hereditary from him.

Judy: Does your dad think about his paternity?

Christian: I think it does not bother him very much.

Cassandra: It is other horrible fact.

Christian: You know what I purport in this my life. I am a connoisseur of nature sciences and it is the most important for me. Who are my parents is not so matter.

Helen: We worry about you.

Christian: Thank you. But do not worry too much. Anything will be OK with my discretion. Excuse me, I can not linger, because my job is waiting me. It is very important. So I have to go and continue my engagement.

Cassandra: Is this all your free time for spending it with us?

Christian: Understand me, please. Now I am fraught with my work, but today I decided to make an intermission and meet you just for a little while, because I saw you and spoke with you long ago. May I go?

Helen: Of course. Thank you for time spending and communication with us. We wish you good luck in your job.

Christian: Thank you! I also wish good luck to all of you.

Author's words: Helen got a letter. She had come home from a market and when she had come in the second floor she saw a big envelope on the floor with a label "Helen, read it."

Beatriz’s letter: Hi, Helen. This is Beatriz, the same extra-decomposer in human view which lived in your aquarium some times ago. I hope, you remember me. I would like know how is Christian and help him with something. I think I have found a clue for his success and I can help. Christian must visit one place where he can reach what he must reach. I would like to tell you about a place where I live now. A man wields a house with a court and an immense lake. I live in this lake with raft of other marine inhabitants. Recently I have known something here. Here Christian has an opportunity to know very much about provenance of extra-decomposers. He must come to the lake, be under the surface of it and talk with me. Here he can know what he cannot know somewhere outwards of this hydrosphere. There is very much impressive regardless provenance of extra-decomposers. Besides there is one creature who is responsible for birth of extra-decomposers. If he and Christian meet each-other he can tell Christian very much about that. But he must not know that Christian considers this appointment his scientific scrutiny. In other words Christian can have appointment with this lake inhabitant as just a guest, but not as a scientist. The devil will not approve a meeting if it is a meeting with a scientist who presumes information from communication with the devil’s to play out important role in his scientific career. The devil will despise such interlocutor and not speak with him. Besides the human who wields all this estate must not know about Christian’s visit. It is possible to get into the lake by flying on a big strong swan over the fence and gates. Don’t think that it is unfathomable to get to the domain without host’s invitation or approval. A swan approvals such visits independently from the host. He does not know about the devil living in the lake albeit the lake appertain him like the court and the house. This letter was delivered to you by one of the swans which live in the demesne of this human. Anything of these words is sheer true.

Author's words: Helen was a bit preoccupated with this information. It was unexpectable for her. She did not understand many things. She decided to pen a response to this letter.

Helen’s letter as answer: Hi. Yes, I remember you. I would like you to fly to me on a swamp or independently and us to talk about anything. At first if it is as I want it to be irrefutable with whom I will speak. At second we will not have to wait answers from each-other for some time. I would like to know the following. Did you discuss with the devil what if Christian visits the underwater space where you live and how this devil refers to people? What devil is this about whom you wrote in your letter? If he does not know that Christian is a scientist what will we must say him if he is interested for what purposes Christian meets with him and gets the information.

Author's words: There is regular meeting of Helen, Cassandra and Judy. The girls share news with each-other. Helen tells friends about the letter from Beatriz and the response letter which she has sent her.

Judy: This little flying shorty with bright green but translucent wigs! Yes, I remember it! It is so conspicuous! I remember its bright green wigs! They are like shreds of pretty and soft tissue! I remember her gentle sweet voice! These long silk hair! Anything in her view I have been remembering till this time and miss her! We have not met it for a long time. Are you serious that it wrote you?

Helen: It is true that I got the letter about which I have just told you. It was from her name. This letter conjured harassment in my mood. The harassment was closer to obscurity than to incense. Getting this letter was a special event. Besides I am not sure this was exactly Beatriz not a crook. I wrote my response and now I am waiting the next response from the author. I do not want there be information that the author can not fly and be shown to me. So my turmoil feelings will be exacerbated.

Cassandra: Why do you suspect that the author of the letter may be not Beatriz?

Helen: How can I know who was this? How Beatriz can write?

Judy: Yes, it is an interesting question where Beatriz has learnt to write. We know she is a marine inhabitant. Then it must be she does not use writing. With whom she has to correspond except you?

Helen: I know nothing regarding this question, but I am agree, this is an interesting question. Maybe she lives not only in water and needs in writing now. Maybe she needs it individually for writing with me.

Judy: Maybe she has a good teacher for learing writing. Maybe there is an english-writing school individually for specific intellectual creatures having size close to her size.

Cassandra: Anyway I think it is absurd to ponder about it very long, because we can not determine a sheer answer to this question. At the first Helen must meet with Beatriz, of course, if the author of the letter was Beatriz and nobody another.

Helen: You are right, Cassandra. It is very interesting to find out all the questions. Frankly, I am a little anxious about this event. It was so unexpectable!

Cassandra: What Beatriz as she posits she can help Christian?

Helen: She wrote that she had met one creature in the lake where she lives now. This is a devil creature who can tell about provenance of the extra-decomposers.

Cassandra: And the author of the letter posited that the devil must not know that Christian is a scientist? He must think that Christian is a simple guest?

Helen: It was written exactly so in the letter.

Cassandra: Maybe the devil despises scientists. It is not fair if it is so. If we know about it specifically and it is really like I presume, I can be incensed! Scientists have all the dignities for respecting!

Helen: I thought about it, too, but I suggest not to hurry now and not to give vent to feelings earlier its time.

Cassandra: I am a little anxious about such thought. Maybe this devil creature is some relentless and inhuman being and Beatriz does not evaluate it as it is really? Maybe this creature is quite peaceful for her, but not for people?

Helen: I understand you, it impells to ponder very deeply. But it is not the one question which impells to ask so important questions. Besides that there is very interesting question what exactly this creature can tell Christian about these extra-decomposers and is it really so that he has not learnt it yet as a scientist and to admit Beatriz's suggestion is the one way to cope with it?

Judy: When did you get the letter?

Helen: I got it yesterday.

Judy: I don't think this is some ominous lure. I want it be a really terrific place. Also I would like us to go with Christian and see it. It is so intriguingly! Such questions like what creature is this, what does it represent will not give me a rest!

Helen: I would like it be not too frenetic! It is very important not only to find out everything what interests us and also stay in our mind.

Cassandra: I think it will be better for me not to go with you. But if you go I will have unrests in my mind. There will be frenetic time in my life. I will not be sure that you would return. How can we know what is this at all?

Helen: Besides Christian has not known this piece of news yet and we do not know how will he refer to it.

Judy: We will not go earlier meeting and particular discussing this contrivance with Beatriz. I hope Beatriz can warrant us that there is no tangible risk for our and Christian's lifes. We would earlier see her!

Helen: I am longing for this meeting, too.

Author's words: Helen, Judy and Cassandra come to the Helen's home from their walking. Helen decides to take the shower Judy at the first turn as one of her guests. Judy has gone to the shower. Helen and Cassandra is noticing that Beatriz is attending in the aquarium. They are glad to see her. Beatriz is soaring in water. Helen and Cassandra are climbing up to a ladder. They are reaching the second floor and come to the room where the hole to the water space is. Helen and Cassandra see that Beatriz is hanging over the hole jarring her wigs.

Beatriz: Hi, girls! Hi, Helen! Nice to meet both of you! I remember you very well. You, Helen, got the letter from me and I hope now is suitable time for us to speak.

Helen: Hi, dear! But why your tail is looking like a natural tail?

Beatriz: Because I am in my other epitome now. The devil-woman has reincarnated me into this epitome of a creature with tail like a tail of a mermaid instead of legs.

Helen: It is curious and astounding. I would like to know who is she at all.

Beatriz: I’ll tell you, of course. But I am a question to you, too. I remember you have a dog named Junior. Is he far now?

Helen: Junior is in his booth now.

Beatriz: I remember you conjured me not to fall on his eyes.

Helen: Junior is sleeping locked in his booth. You may hang in air. Where have you learnt to write?

Beatriz: I cannot write. The devil creature wrote the letter according to what I wanted write you. I caught a moment when a host was not at home and flew into one of his rooms through the window where I give writing instruments and brought them to the devil creature.

Cassandra: Can you tell us about the devil creature?

Beatriz: Of course, I can.

Helen: Yes. Exactly. We would like to know very much about this devil creature. I remember you wrote that the human who is a host of the court with this lake knows about the creature nothing. This proposition compels to take thought how does it refer to people. Besides we have some other questions related with the devil creature which are opportune as we think. At first, we are concerned if you have some testimony to represent it to us right now that we will not get in cul-de-sac when we meet it.

Beatriz: I did not want bring you turmoil feelings. I really feel myself a bit fumble by looking at Cassandra's frenetic view. I do not compel you and Christian to go. Believe me, if you are people it is enough pertinent for you to communicate with such devil creature as this.

Cassandra: Can you tell us about the devil without any superfluous words? How do you know that it is responsible for appearance of extra-decomposers in our world?

Beatriz: There is one devil-woman in human views. She lives in the lake where I live now. She does not feel neither loathing nor contempt to people despite she is a devil. She has created these extra-decomposers like me.

Helen: Does she refer to such people as scientists not fairly?

Beatriz: She does not refer to scientists with loathing or disdain, she refers to them neutrally, but she must not know that Christian wants to talk with her as a scientist with such purpose as to develop his knowledges in extra-decomposers area. She would not like to foster to the scientists. Another case is talking with a human as a simple guest.

Author's words: Judy is entering to the room.

Judy: Beatriz! Hi! We have not seen each-other for a long time!

Beatriz: Hi, Judy!

Judy: I have one meaningful question to you. I hope you are disinfected now again?

Beatriz: Judy, I lived not in the swamp last time. I lived in a lake. So there are no good reasons to squeamish me. It was such clean hydrosphere as in the Helen's aquarium.

Judy: Are you sure?

Beatriz: I know about the lake enough much, trust me.

Helen: There are such marine inhabitants in the lake where lived Beatriz the last time which do not differ from inhabitants in my aquarium.

Cassandra: At least it is very staggering that we, people, will communicate with the Devil. I worry about such question: maybe there is something unfathomable for a human mind regarding these extra-decomposers?

Beatriz: What do you mean unfathomable?

Cassandra: It may be that these devil creatures can turn out something maddening for a human.

Helen: But Christian has enough strong mind in this life. He is ready to anything.

Judy: How has she create you if you were born in human epitome earlier and after that was turned into an extra-decomposer?

Beatriz: I do not see discrepancy in my words. I was a human earlier. You are right. But I had died being a human and after that the woman-devil created the extra-decomposer body and I was reincarnated in it. The woman-devil has made it.

Judy: Can you tell us about this woman-devil and more concrete how she refers to the extra-decomposers?

Beatriz: What is related with the appearance of extra-decomposers I know only that she has created the extra-decomposers with her mysterious forces. I can tell how she looks if you want.

Helen: I am not rebuff to listen.

Beatriz: She is like a human in general. She has body like a human body. But she also has some differences from a human. For example, she has a tail like a lion tail, horns, clutches. Also she has 3 eyes unlike a human. She wields unbelieveable devil force. She has created extra-decomposers according to her own initiative seeing that there is real carrion excess in nature.

Judy: I feel my great desire to find myself in there! I feel a fervor sense right now!

Helen: I see even to stifle your fervor it is downright impossible to you! I am rather unrested than intrigued in such extent.

Cassandra: I am not downright sure that it is not such situation to lapse into not good status.

Beatriz: Don't worry. There are no peril for you.

Judy: I believe the woman-devil is a good person. It is decidedly, I will go!

Helen: It is a typical devil view how Beatriz described the woman-devil.

Beatriz: Now I am going to imbue into the lake. You will have to fly by swans. You can not afford to go through the court of the host. I will fly for the swans and negotiation with it. After that there will be a moment when the swans will can take you to the lake.

Helen: But we will can fly not in any moment.

Beatriz: We will discuss the questions when there will be suitable moment for everybody of you to fly. Let me tell you a story of my life. It is about important events which occurred with me after I had left Helen. I was caught by a human who brought me to a sale. I was sold in a marine pets shop. I was unwittingly impelled to be sold and so unwittingly I was impelled to be bought by one family. A little girl covered the surface of their aquarium with a lid with the purpose to hinder my redemption from her. When she took me from the aquarium I was impelled to serve the girl as a toy. She played with her toys and me as a living toy. I was a striking toy for her. She gave me a name. I said I already had a name, but it did not bother her. Sometimes these games were just untenable for me! Mummy of this girl stitched dresses, blouses, skirts and slippers for me. The family saw that I did not like live in their aquarium. They wanted take me with themselves to the beach, but afraid that I would run away from them. I remember one time they caged me into a bird cage and strapped the cage to a ball with a rope. They went to a beach with me confined into these implements. Sometimes it looked like I was an inalienable part of life of these children when they had begun take me with themselves to the beach. I had such dream thought that the children would grew up and toys will be repealed and may be my freedom would be resumed. But there had been one coup of events in result of which I had breached to the will earlier than the children would grow up.

Cassandra: It is so unfair that you lost will! I have already understood very well your destination in this world. I find that your slavery confronted fulfilling your mission!

Helen: This girl's behavior was so brazenness!

Beatriz: Of course, this life seemed preposterous and meaningless to me. You are completely right. I am in this world with completely other purpose. But there were such circumstances where I pleased by the arm of these kids and become a hostage. They had enough powers to be my overlords.

Helen: This girl was so toad!

Beatriz: I am agree altogether with you. But people like money very much. The bigger gain is the more satisfied people are. So they caught and took me to the shop of those considerations that I can bring them success as demanded merchandise.

Judy: Selfish! You, poor little helpless being! This story really cost contempt for them!

Helen: Yes, really. What you have transferred us is that really conjures seething of quicks! Did these people feed you with carrion?

Beatriz: No, they did not. I can eat not only carrion.

Helen: What did you eat when you lived in this cage?

Beatriz: I ate what the children gave me. In the beginning it was such food as fish feed. But some time later the children noticed that I could not eat it. It fell out from me. Soon I got illness. The family summoned a veterinary. Not the first veterinary could explain them what happened with me. I had guessworks regarding my illness, but nobody of the members of the family believed me. The guessworks were that the reason of the illness was that I had eaten not my food. The veterinary said the same and also he said that he could give the family some medical prescriptions to help me. They spurned this idea because they had decided that it would be too inconvenient for them. So they threw me out. Before that I asked the veterinarian if that was possible to me carry about myself without help. The veterinary said that there was necessity to write a long medical prescription. Because of I could not write I had to carry about myself. I had lived in nature without help for some time being ill while the woman-devil took me under her oversaw. She was very useful custodian for me. Maybe she is omnipotence and the fact is that she has helped me to recover. I was very thankful to her. But now I don't like my life in the lake with her. She is my overlord. Now I have a grander undertaking before the woman-devil to serve her and I can not dare to rebuff from my responsibility before her.

Judy: Is it true that she allowed you to go to a far distance from her?

Beatriz: Yes, it is, but if she does not waited me till soon moment of time her incense will rage and she will fly for me here and find me.

Helen: May I ask a question related with the idea regarding your cure which was suggested by the veterinary?

Beatriz: Of course, you may.

Helen: You could not write and there was necessity to write very much. These 2 facts were the reason why you could not solve the question about your recovery independently. I think your hosts could write. If it is true then I have such question: could they take to themselves writing and in the same time you take to yourself the cure?

Beatriz: These people had to go they did not know where to mine some medical facilities. We did not know where is a forest with such plants. Besides I needed carrion. They did not want cook me feed of carrion. It was abhorrent for them. Besides they thought that to let me fly outwards of their living space and to reckon that I would continue life in their aquarium are irreconcilable in the same time. They thought that if they had released me I would have run away from them. So they decided to let me fly to freedom.

Cassandra: I think we have told about your past enough. I want us change the theme a little if you do not take offense and are agree that we have told about this your story enough. There are some other questions which not just interest us and conjure obscurity in our mind. I would like us to discuss them.

Helen: Have your wigs not tired yet from their trepidation? You may sit on the floor.

Beatriz: Thank you, Helen, but it was not enough to tire. I move to large distances for long time periods and tire a little with that.

Cassandra: But I cannot say I am longing for the meetings with a devil creature very much.

Helen: We must thoroughly think do we have to go or we do not. It is about Christian, too.
Hi, Christian.

Christian: Hi, girls.

Helen: We are going to tell you a news. Beatriz has advice for you. It is related to your inquiry . I think you have some dearth of your knowledges about extra-decomposers. The proposal is about something what can help you to fill it.

Christian: Really?

Helen: I would not like kid with you. But the trust is that you will must speak with one devil creature if you acceptthe offer. This devil has created extra-decomposers and can tell you very much about their Beatriz posits that it is not somebody unrelenting to humans.

Beatriz: Yes, Christian. Be calm, please. I want tell you about this creature. I think the idea to go is very good idea.

Christian: But devil is associated with evil for people.

Beatriz: It is just preconceptions. This woman is not evil for us. She is very good-looking and friendly person. She helped me to recover after my illness which I had gotten afterward of one unpleasant story occured in my life. Nobody would help me except her. I am so thankful to her!

Helen: But you said she is very hard with you. You have liabilities of her. You are not free and so you do not like your life with her.

Beatriz: Yes, when I was free it was better. Now I live in the lake with her and there I am urged to serve her. But I am very thankful to the woman-devil now. Maybe I would not live now if she was not in my life. I feel I owe her despite it incites me to rack my brains.

Judy: What responsibility do you have of her?

Beatriz: I have many responsibilities of her. I have role of a maidservant, nurse and toy for little hatched cubs of marine inhabitants. Those cubs are not her descendants, but she is a ringleader of this underwater world. She can assign me such roles which she thinks I must comply. So I help her to arrange her places and refuges under water which she uses with different purposes. I am used as a nurse for cubs of little animals and as a toy for cubs of big animals such as cats. They play with me like cats with cordage what I don't like very much.

Judy: Do you want to say that cats live in the lake?

Beatriz: No, I don't say this. Cats don't live in the lake, but sometimes when I am out of the lake they meet me and play with me.

Cassandra: Then you have to be out of the lake not very often and when you are out you have to fly in such high where the cats cannot reach you.

Beatriz: Yes, you are right.

Cassandra: Does the host of the court know about your life in the lake?

Beatriz: No, he does not.

Cassandra: Does he know something about some of animals living in this lake?

Beatriz: I do not know does he know or not.

Christian: Excuse me, please. May I ask to tell me about the lake more. I understand, it is a lake in a somebody's court?

Beatriz: Yes, there is a house and a court of 2 people. There is a lake in the court where I live now. Also there is world under water in this lake with huge plurality of different marine animals. I am one of them.

Christian: How were you gotten to this world?

Beatriz: After my life in Helen's aquarium I was caught by one man who brought me to a shop where I was bought by one family. I lived in their aqarium. They did not feed me how they were must and as consequences I got illness. People decided that it would be too difficult to them to treat me and they throw me out. Later this woman-devil found and cured me near a river. After that she brought me to this court and I started to live with her.

Helen: All right. Let’s return to our conversation about your idea to invite Christian for talking with the woman-devil.

Beatriz: What does else interest us about her?

Cassandra: We would like be assured that there be nothing menacing for us.

Beatriz: I have already tried to explain that the woman-devil is not grim for you despite you associate devils with evil. I have no idea how to convince you in other way. More by token the woman-devil must not know that you are a scientist and you want to talk with her in such purposes as bring something new in your learning extra-decomposers. Besides the hosts of the estate who know nothing about wonders in this underwater world must know nothing about your visit in this lake. You will have to mine a diving suit, penetrate into the lake and talk with the woman-devil in there. You can use a big, strong and clever swan to fly over the fence to the lake. After that you can dive into water and meet the woman-devil.

Christian: Can I listen your narrative about the woman-devil as notably as you can tell?

Beatriz: She is like a human in outline. She has 2 hands and legs, head, hair and figure like a human one. But she has some differences from a human. She has big clutches, horns and tail like a lion’s. Also she has 3 eyes, 2 of which are on the face like a human and third big one on her polly.

Helen: How do you know this? Did you saw how she changed her clothes?

Beatriz: She is almost always unclad.

Judy: Almost always unclad!?

Cassandra: Are you serious? It is terrible! It is so indecently!

Beatriz: What indecent do you find in it?

Cassandra: It is very indecent among us, people. Did you know about that? How this woman-devil precenses among people?

Beatriz: She is not among people. She lives in the lake among marine animals. It is not indecent in the underwater world.

Judy: Does the woman-devil have wigs to move in water and air like you?

Beatriz: I have never seen she had wigs, but I know she can change imaginary.

Christian: Where she is from and how this information about the woman-devil is connected with extra-decomposers?

Beatriz: She has flew from some place, but I don't know exactly from which one. She has created the extra-decomposers with her cryptic forces.

Christian: I have insatiable desire to engage science very often, but I do not think devil ordinances must be included in my science.

Beatriz: Why?

Christian: Because the science as engagement of a scientist is one activity area and this devil magic is entirely other area.

Beatriz: But I am not agree with this.

Christian: Thank you very much for your proposal, but I want you understand me. You are just one of the specific wonderful creatures in nature. I am a professional scientist. I know about science and job of a scientist tangibly more than you. I know what ideas I must admit and what ideas I must not. Please, don't take offense at me. I do not need information about provenance of extra-decomposers if it is based on magic. Learning their anatomy, lifestyle, roles executed by them and their place in nature - this is what is actual for scientists like me.

Cassandra: I knew that you, Beatriz, would have to induce to persuade Christian to go.

Judy: But I want go with you.

Beatriz: No problems if you have a possibility to mine a diving suit. You can sit on a big swan and fly to the lake. You must do it not from the side of the house. The swan will brought you right. So you don't have to worry.

Judy: But I have no possibility to mine a diving suit. Can I talk with the woman-devil out of the lake?

Beatriz: I will have to negotiate with her about it. Do you see, there is necessaty to hide from eyes of the hosts. So you will have to talk somewhere in the court where the hosts will not see you. Somewhere near the lake behind the trees.

Author's words: Judy, Beatriz and Woman-devil take part in this part. Judy is visiting Woman-devil's living place and meet her together with Beatriz. Beatriz and Judy negotiated that Beatriz would wrote to Woman-devil a letter where she would discuss date, time and place of meeting. Before Judy came her friends were not squared off by the question about Judy's walking to Woman-devil.

Cassandra: Judy, you are so brave!

Judy: Do you think there is a jeopardy to accept the idea to go thither?

Cassandra: Do you see, devil is associated with evil for human. It was said in our recent conversation.

Judy: But I don't trust this prejudices. I do not like your tumult, but I like the idea. I have Beatriz who warants that there is no serious menace for us. Let her be responsible for her words. And Resignation is the one what remains to you.

Cassandra: It is like you have impression scarcity.

Judy: I don't have impression fertility . I will not abdicate the unusual intriguing proposal of Beatriz. I think it will be something just pulsatile to meet with those who created the extradecomposers! They are interesting creatures! So it is such eagerness ! Beatriz has already send a letter to Woman-devil. In this letter she asked her such some questions which imply the information which can help successfully to plan our meeting.

Helen: You will be a great connoiseur possessing knowledges in the extra-decomposers area, won't you?

Judy: Maybe, but now I am not planning became a scientist like Christian.

Author's words: A little time later Judy and Beatriz met each-other and talk about the trip to Woman-devil. Beatriz told Judy about such aspects as date, time and place of meeting. There were a few dates when the host would be not at home. Beatriz said that Judy that she could go in any of them.

Beatriz: There is a necessarity that the host did not see us.

Judy: Why it is so?

Beatriz: According to the Woman-devil's words precense of extraneous people can summon host's backlash.

Judy: It is strange. What is wrong with this host?

Beatriz: You know, you do not know, of course, the host is not absolutely adequate. But do not worry, please. Also you do not know how strong is Woman-devil. She will defense you from any psycho. But what should  we talk about it if he will not be at home when we go.

Judy: There are some interesting questions for me. Is it so dirty in the lake as in the swamp

Beatriz: No, of course, it is not. I told that it is not so dirty in this lake. Have you forgotten?

Judy: Yes. You told. I have forgotten. I am sorry.

Beatriz: Not so big trouble. Do not hold it in your mind so sensually

Judy: And other question. Will Woman-devil be unclad in our meeting? I do not want it was so.

Beatriz: Well, I'll write her with a polite request not to be unclad in front of you. More precisely you will write under my dictation because I can not write, а course.

Author's words: Judy and Beatriz met Woman-devil near Judy's living place. Woman-devil arrived there on her horse. Of course, it was an appalling acquaintance for Judy. She saw that Woman-devil looked not very similar to a usual human. She looked like Beatriz described her in the conversation with Judy and her friends. But Woman-devil was not like an ugly scarecrow. Also she was not very similar to a human. She was closer to an attractive toy than to a horrible monster or a human. Her figure was more similar to a figure of a toy than a human figure. Her head was not less wide than shoulders. Her height was lower than Judy's height. It reached Judy's lips. Eyes were very big and their form was more similar to circles than to form of human eyes. Accordingly to it her edge were so big. Hair was in thick and long scythe ending lower her polly. Accordingly to Judy's feelings Woman-devil's hair were very dense like toy's hair. Her polly was visibly wider than the part of her body from shoulders till waist. Woman-devil was closed in a dark swimsuit and dark cloak on her back. Beatriz presented her and Judy to each-other.

Judy: Hi, Woman-devil. Nice to meet you.

Woman-devil: For you, Lady Devil

Beatriz: I am glad you are getting acquainted. Judy, this is the Woman=devil, the person about whom I told you, Helen and Cassandra. Lady devil, This is Judy. Woman-devil is a great inhabitant on out planet. She has created indispensable remedy to defense this planet from carrion depletion.

Woman-devil: This is a very clever postulation. I can tell you, Judy, more about myself. I really have great magical forces and create my extra-decomposers through them. I gave them such title as extra-decomposers. I gqve Beatriz life. I did not create her, but I remade her. She was very ill and dead. I freed her from illness, turned her into alive, but sleepy human. After that I reduced her, added her respiratory system to breathe water and rolled up in a cocoon, created through my magical forces. Some time later I launched the cocoon. Beatriz woke up with these pretty and bright wigs and horns like wigs and horns of a butterfly. We greeted each-other and told about themselves. After that I allowed her to fly and live everywhere where she wanted. When I and Beatriz had met again she told me about her life in the your friend's aquarium, ocean, swamp and the aquarium of those abhorrent people. Now she has the debt in front of me - to play out a role of an extra-decomposer, because I helped her to aquire life 2 times. I can endue animals consciousness. So I have endued some snakes and swans. Now they understand what I want from them like people. So some swans can serve us as postmen. So I and Beatriz penned when Beatriz lived in the acquarium of your friend. Besides, as you, maybe know, I am here with one serious purpose.

Beatriz: And, as I know, you know, what purpose is it. You and all your friends whom I met know as I think. At first turn, Helen with whom I communicated about my mission and place in nature.

Judy: Yes, we know, of course.

Beatriz: And our appearance is straight related with Woman-devil. She has created us. So, the mission about which she said is to help nature through us.

Woman-devil: Yes, I am a really strong and omnipotent person. We are going to show you many wonders which are her subject.

Judy: Your omnipotence is something so great! How do you create all these extra-decomposers?

Woman-devil: I create them through my magic, of course. Do you want go with us in water of ocean?

Judy: No, I do not. Thank you. I am not going, because I can not breathe water like you.

Beatriz: And you have not acquired a diving suit?

Judy: Sorry, I did not have a possibility to acquire it.

Beatriz: It is a pity that you can not plunge into underwater world with us. It is wonderful under  water.

Woman-devil: As I know people can not communicate with marine animals besides they can not breathe under water without special water accessories. If Judy can not plunge under water with us lets not to torment ourselves with this disadvantage. We can have a wonderful time out of the ocean.

Judy: Excuse me, Lady Devil. Did you intend to invite me to be on meeting with you in ocean except in the lake?

Woman-devil: No, you are not entirely right. There was no invitation to go to lake. There was only my suggestion to visit a part of ocean. I, Beatriz and many other animals now live in ocean. We have our confined with a border part in ocean. There a lot of other different marine animals live in this part with us. We are a big friendly company. Moreover, I was born in the bottom of the ocean. There I have been living during whole my life.

Judy: But Beatriz told that there are swans who swim on the surface of the water space where you live now. She said that it is possible to fly to you using the swans as transport.

Woman-devil: There is a lake not far from our ocean and there are swans. But I did not have such suggestion as to visit water in this lake. I had only such suggestion for you as to visit our part of ocean and see our world. But because you can not to admit this suggestion, I and Beatriz will tell you about our world. It is Pacific ocean and we have to live there near its banks because there are some dishonest people living right there. The nature is contaminated very much. The banks are contaminated too much with different litter and yuck. It is really appallingly and abhorrent! But I see so incentive to work in my wonderful guys extra-decomposers as it must be. I am very glad how they do what they must do.

Judy: May I ask what is the border of?

Woman-devil: The border is a steal high thick lattice with big cells. It is a very high lattice and was built by me with help of many marine animals. I can negotiate with different marine animals. There are no predators in our confined world. It is very peaceful there. We negotiated to separate the space and live separately from predatory animals. The space is enough far-flung and it is spaciously for us including Beatriz who does not like little close space. The lattice is only about 1 meter not enough to the surface of the ocean.

Judy: May I interest what marine animals helped you in building this lattice?

Woman-devil: Merpeople, different extra-decomposers and some marine animals like crabs, tortoises, squids and other. Now anybody who is a predatory animal lives out of our place.

Judy: It is impressive. Does Beatriz leave this place by swimming through a cell of the lattice to walk out of it?

Woman-devil: Yes, she does. It is interesting for her.

Judy: Does she seek any adventures?

Woman-devil: As I understand, she does.

Judy: What is very interesting what are these adventures? Maybe Beatriz longs for some adventures where is a gravity for life of creatures like her?

Beatriz: No, nothing like this! You understand quite wrong, Judy! I just see the underwater world and communicate with different marine inhabitants. I do not seek perilous adventures.

Judy: And what do you talk with them about?

Beatriz: I talk with them about different things like life in the ocean regarding different aspects such as life style of these animals, their reproducing, nurturing their youngs and many things like these. Please, do not worry about me. I beg you.

Judy: I thought you live in a lake, but now I know you live not in a lake, you live in an ocean. It is what induced Helen to worry about you. I remember you said the part of ocean where you live is fenced by a big and thick lattice, but who knows what else? You said you like seeking adventures out of these your living part of ocean. Who knows how buxom this fence is? You want say you can warrant that no predators can disturbance the lattice and reach you?

Woman-devil: I can warrant that I have enough strong magic forces to create enough buxom obstraction of predators.

Judy: Where have you got the building material steal from?

Woman-devil: From a material factory.

Judy: And how is it related with your magic forces?

Woman-devil: There is very much what I can tell you. Lets sit on my horse and go to the bank of the ocean and I will give you much information.

Author's words: Woman-devil, Judy and Beatriz sat on the horse's back and moved to the way.

Judy: Lady Devil, have you ever had wigs and flew through them?

Woman-devil: Yes, I had. I can do with myself what I have done with Beatriz but not reducing myself. If I want fly like a butterfly I roll myself in a cocoon and sleep in it. The cocoon hangs on a branch of a very big and strong wood. When I wake up I unwrap the cocoon and have big wigs and horns like a butterfly. I can fly moving my wigs so much as I want. Also I can discard them

Judy: Cool! And they drown in the ocean and lay on its bottom?

Woman-devil: No, they just dissapear.

Judy: What are we going to the ocean for?

Woman-devil: Do not you want go there?

Judy: I do not confront this idea, but I am interested why we are going there. I said that I can not span class="from_vocabulary">imbue into the ocean.

Woman-devil: I thought you wanted be close to the ocean, the present refuge of mine and Beatriz.

Beatriz: We had such thought that if you can not come to be in our living place then it implies that you would like to come to be near it.

Judy: Ok. Lets do so.

Woman-devil: I will tell you about me and our life on the way. But I must warn you that you, may be will understand not everything clearly. But do not be distressed if it is so. Now I am answering your last question. You asked how my magic forces are related with strength of the fencing. So I am explaining you, but at first I must say that it may be very puzzling for you. You as a human may not understand much. I hope you will be satisfied by the information which you will get from me. Well, what is related with my forces and this lattce - both are related in reality. Forces like mine let make buildings very buxom. They can influence phisical laws and as a result my buildings under my own intention. I am an embodiment from the hereafter. So I can do very much. There is no disparity from my view-point. You were right when you talked about my omnipotence, because I am not a simple human. I am a devil in human female imagery from the hereafter. I have a very grander mission in this world and it is for favor for your universe with life planet.

Beatriz: Judy knows that it is for favor for this world. I remember I, Judy and her friend talked about it. I remember I talked about it with Judy's friend in whose aquarium I lived. I think all her  friends know about it now

Woman-devil: What else do you want hear about?

Judy: My friend Helen whose pet Beatriz was for some time told about one abstract catastrophy alluding to Beatriz's words. What catastrophe is this?

Woman-devil: Do not worry. It is completely not your problem. Only I and, of course, my creatures which are called, as you see, extra-decomposers are responsible for this.

Judy: But what was this?

Woman-devil: People who live near the ocean in which I and Beatriz live now, do not have clear conscience and do not strive to endorse cleaness. So nature in the ocean and on its banks is contaminated very seriously. So my extra-decomposers work for refinement it.

Judy: May I ask why you have been living during whole your life in the ocean, not out of it somewhere on land?

Woman-devil: I have already known that people do not like me very much.

Author's words: The horse is hastening. Judy feels shiver.

Judy: What are we doing?

Woman-devil: We are hasting, as you see. Now we are going to fly more quickly. I have explained what for. What bothers you, Judy?

Judy: Oh, no, Woman-devil, stop it, please! I can hold! I am going to fall!

Author's words: Woman-devil is stopping the horse. Judy is breathing heavily

Beatriz: So we will have to reach for a very long time. The distance from here to the ocean is very enormous. It is measured in hundreds of kilometers.

Judy: What ocean is it?

Woman-devil: Pacific. The way will be very long if we move with so low speed.

Judy: How much time it takes for you and Beatriz on this horse when you go such distance as from the place of our meeting to the ocean?

Woman-devil: It is the first time when I go such distance. I do not know how much time the trip will take. But I am sure it will be not like a few minutes. It will takes hours.

Judy: But I am afraid so big speed. So, I think, we have to part right now if it is the one way to go to the ocean.

Woman-devil: There are 2 ways, but at the moment there is only one way - on my horse. He begins have wigs like bird wigs after distillation. It can raise and fly with them.

Judy: What is the second way?

Woman-devil: Sometimes I have wigs, too, as I told. I have wigs as if I was a gigantic butterfly. But I make my wigs only after my dreaming through the cocoon like a caterpillar. Current minutes are not my minutes for dream. So now I can not have wigs and bring you and Beatriz to the ocean on my back.

Judy: Then I think it is time to part.

Author's words: At this moment Judy got a thought regarding her riot about Christian. Judy is bothered by his fate in previous life. Maybe Woman-devil is related with Christian's storie in his previous life?

Woman-devil: Yes, Of course, you may go.

Judy: I want ask you another one question.

Woman-devil: I listen you.

Judy: Do you know about my acquaintance Christian? Beatriz wanted them to go to your world and talk with you, but he refused?

Woman-devil: I heard about one human whom Beatriz wanted invite to our meeting in the ocean. But Beatriz did not say his name.

Judy: Probably she meant Christian. He told us his harsh storie and I thought maybe it is related with you.

Woman-devil: What storie?

Judy: At first I have to ask you have you been living in our world for a very long time?

Woman-devil: Yes, I have according to human measurements. I have been living here for many human years. What sharp storie about your acquaintance was this?

Judy: He was a scientist and one night in his life when he carried out his scientific deal in a forest he collided with a mystery creature. It played out very negative role in his life. He could not to continue to engage science so long as he wanted. Now he lives his next life and claims to continue doing science what he could not continue in his previous life. When he told us about this event in his previous life he described the creature which he saw. So I thought, maybe, it was one of your creatures? Can you remember all your creatures, if they are not too much?

Woman-devil: How Christian described the creature?

Judy: It was similar to a monster. But I can not describe it particularly. Sorry. I remember only such facts that it had red burning in darkness eyes and clutches. Christian was daunted with it. So he has abdicated from his engagement and run away from the forest. After that he had tangible troubles in his life. He was taken for a madman.

Woman-devil: So if it was a monster and it was related with me it means it could be only me in monster imaginary. I am very sorry.

Beatriz: May I paste my word, please?

Judy: Of course, you may.

Beatriz: I want you, Lady Devil, to notice that Judy does not want accuse you with offense. But she sincerely regrets about Christian's fate. So she wants find out the reason for this accident. Also she wants this Christian's trouble not to repeat again.

Woman-devil: I understand. I really can take monsters imaginaries at night when I go to forests and dissipate my extra-decomposers there. I did it. But I do not know how looks Christian and I do not remember how looked the people whom I saw in the forests. So I can not remember my meeting with Christian. But you have to transfer Christian from me the information that he may not to worry in the forests. If I being in a monster imaginary see people in a forest I will take not scary imaginary. And if I see that they are daunted I will calm down them. I will try not to allow them go mad.

Judy: So I was very glad to see you, Lady Devil and you, Beatriz, too. I think it is time to say good bye and part.

Beatriz: We were gald, too. Have good and durable impressions.

Author's words: Judy is getting down from the horse

Beatriz: I would like you to go to visit us and see multitude of different marine inhabitants. Also we would talk else.

Judy: Sorry, Beatriz. I think it would be interesting, but I am not sure I will have such possibility.

Beatriz: Then I just wish you good luck and long positive impressions.

Woman-devil: From me, too.

Judy: Thank you.

Author's words: Judy is going in direction to home. Woman-devil and Beatriz are flying off on the horse.
There Woman-devil, Beatriz and Lilian are sitting in the bottom of the lake.

Woman-devil: Beatriz, can you scratch my nails on the legs?

Beatriz: Of course, I can.

Woman-devil: Then move here, please, and do it for me. Today we can talk about your last visit to your onetime host if you want

Author's words: Beatriz is swimming to Woman-devil with a cleaning stone.

Woman-devil: I wish you, Lilian, to be here, too, and to help Beatriz. I wish her to clean my nails on one my leg and you to clean my nails on my other leg.

Lilian: Yes, I understand the request. I am rushing.

Beatriz: Me too.

Woman-devil: You may not rush so much. I can wait while you reach me.

Author's words: Beatriz and Lilian give stones, awim to Woman-devil and begin clean Woman-devil's nails

Beatriz: I think there is nothing especially new. Christian is fond with his engagement as usually. Unfortunately, he did not admit proposal to go here and knew something interesting about the extra-decomposers.

Woman-devil: Did you tell him that the host of the estate is inadequate?

Beatriz: No I did not. I did not prefer to say Christian about it.

Woman-devil: So you were right that you did not dare to do that.

Beatriz: But Christian abdicated from this idea at least.

Woman-devil: It is his own right. If he does not prefer to do what you suggested him than just let him to do  what he prefers to do. How were your last days in the aquarium of your first host where you flied recently?

Beatriz: Good, Lady Devil. I spent these days in the aquarium of my host, communicated with her friends. They all met me with goodwill. We talked about my proposal as you know. Besides I communicated with animals in Helen's aquarium before my communication with the people.

Woman-devil: Do you like marine animals in her aquarium?

Beatriz: Of course, I do. But, frankly, they do not differ tangibly from the animals which I saw in the ocean.

Woman-devil: Are you serious?

Beatriz: Yes, I am serious. I communicated with the animals in the ocean about my life in the swamp. I talked with the animals in Helen's aquarium to the same topic. I told them the same what I told the animals in the ocean. I think both categories of the animals were interested in the same extent.

Woman-devil: It means there is no tangible difference between yourmconversation with the animals of one category and other one. But I have not seen yet any difference between the animals in your narrative. Maybe you wanted say that there is simillarity between them which is that all of them are equally friendly and interested in the same questions regarding to you?

Beatriz: I don't know how to say to be true. I communicated with all of them almost to the same theme. I told them almost the same about myself and my life in the swamp. It is about what I communicated with them. I communicated with them about something completely other not so much.

Woman-devil: I have no doubts that if we talk exactly about the inhabitants and not about something other what may be related with them, for example, what your communication with them. We can notice that many of them are completely different: their view, body structure, nutrition and lifestyle - the difference is very obvious.

Author's words: For some moments there was continuing silence. It was transgressed by the words of Woman-devil:

Woman-devil: But there are some similarities between all the marine animals which differ them from people. Some people are so freaks what I can not say about animals.

Lilian: What summons disturbance regarding people in you?

Woman-devil: Some people are so cruel and relentless being regarding nature! I do not ceasecontaminate nature without a good reason. I find it a quite meaningless and absurd! I do not like it! But, from other side, we have deal on this planet, thanks to this unpleasant fact.

Lilian: Is there a gravity for me regarding the host of these estate?

Woman-devil: You will be in safety if you are under water always.

Author's words: A medusa is swimming towards to Woman-devil.

Woman-devil: I did not summon you here. What do you want from me?

Medusa: I would like know about what you are telling.

Woman-devil: It is not regardless you, trust me.
It is about people who live in the houses on the bank of this lake. They are so blackguard! But I think you will never meet them because you always are in the water and he always are out of it.

Lilian: But I listened that people can swim in water and breathe in there in special hemlets.  Such people are called divers.

Woman-devil: There is an interesting question: what our host Joe has to look for here? I will arrange him a wonderful swimming!

Lilian: I think we must retreat this human! I do not like this fact that he can imbue here.

Woman-devil: I do not like it, too. But I will take measures over this fact.

People who live on the banks of our ocean contributed to its pollution. They use the banks as a dump. There is so much litter and carrion here: waste from different jetsam of these people, corpses of died animals and people!

Lilian: People are a terrific kind of life! It is terrible! How is it possible to contaminatewhen nature when you can escape this?

Medusa: I have literally nothing to spoil live nature.

Woman-devil: Yes, really, people are a terrific life specie. But there is explaination how can they be able  to do what representatives of other species can not do. Human nature is not what is nature of the special marine creature like you.  Besides there is such fact that human life goes on not in the same world where your life goes on, what is a very important  circumstance.

Lilian: You, must be, went to the human world to stop such people as Joe?

Woman-devil: Yes, of course. We intend to do this.

Lilian: What should we do with Joe?

Beatriz: How will you stop him?

Woman-devil: I will engage him. I reflected about this question and I have concluded that I can talk with him and propel him to stop beastliness. Maybe you will trust me soon, maybe you will not. Don't worry, please. Anything will be all right.

Beatriz: How will you stop him?

Woman-devil: I will not let him to imbue here too deeply. Moreover there will be no necessarity for him to tamper in this lake according to my purposes. I will talk with him out and very far from this lake

Medusa: You can live out of water and speak with people! It is surprising!

Woman-devil: Of course, I can. Why not? Beatriz and Lilian can, too. But, of course, it is better for them to keep in the lake and not to stick out.

Medusa: I can defense myself through my stinging tentacles!

Woman-devil: You will not have to do this. I will not let Joe to imbue there.

Lilian: Did Joe told you why he has became a scoundrel?

Woman-devil: No, he did not.

Medusa: What storie was this with him?

Woman-devil: Do you mean an event in the result of which he has became such human?

Medusa: Yes. What storie was this with him?

Woman-devil: I don't know for sure.

Lilian: But, may be, there are some hypothesis?

Woman-devil: I will find it out when I talk with him. Also I will not let him to spoil nature. Frankly I have already tired from this beastliness.

Beatriz: We wish you to be successfull.

Woman-devil: Thank you.

Lilian: But it means we loose our urge to refine nature. What will we do if this beastliness finishes?

Woman-devil: Do not worry. We will decide what will you do. You, Lilian, can live without refinement. Beatriz can became a human or somebody like me.

Beatriz: It is wonderful that I can do it!

Woman-devil: You can't, unfortunately. Do not take offense at me, please. But it is true that Beatriz was a human earlier. Now she would like to be a human again. You have never been somebody except a mermaid.

Author's words: This morning Joe went to the train station. There will be something unexpectable for him in the station, but he has not know about it yet.

Voice on the terminal: Do not be daunted by the snake. It is not a hazard for you.

Author's words: Joe turned and saw that there is a big snake creeping straight to him. He began silently watch in it. When the snake had precipitated to him it began talk with him.

Joe: What do you want from me?

Snake: We must get acquainted and discuss something.

Author's words: Joe was daunted, of course, how can this snake know about his personal dark life.

Joe: Are you trying to imbue me that you are not black entity for a human despite the denomination which you are called?

Author's words: Of course, Joe felt hard tumult after this meeting.

Woman-devi: My conversation with Joe was excellent!

Lilian: Will we always be in safety?

Maniac.about_characters: It is a storie about a dangerous and merciless murderer.

Author's words: Ramon, Randi and W are spies. They live in the basement of the Joe's house. Joe know about it nothing.
The characters are sitting in Joe's living place and talk between each-other.

Quentin: Oh, of course. I understand you.

Ramon: How do you know about it?

Quentin: I can read human thoughts. I know about Joe's thoughts and I know who is he from them.

Ramon: Do you mean the snake's ability to read human thoughts?

W: Of course, I mean exactly this.

Ramon: But what if we have some perslonal thoughts and embarass them in front of you?

Quentin: I do not hear the thoughts which are not actual for me. Relax.

Author's words: But if we have some thoughts related with our common deals I will wish all of us to discuss them  aloud including you.

Quentin: Of course. I know you can not read thoughts like me.

W: Frankly, I like sso cruel stories not very mych.
